itinerary_data.name: Broadway Show Experience
itinerary_data.description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Broadway with this exciting itinerary in New York City!

events.name: Broadway Show - The Lion King
events.description: Experience the magic of The Lion King on Broadway!

venues.name: Minskoff Theatre
venues.description: Home to the iconic Broadway show - The Lion King

routes.details: Take the subway or bus back to your accommodation.

feedback_for_retry:
FORMAT ISSUES:
- Event 1 missing required field: id
- Event 1 missing required field: start_time
- Event 1 missing required field: end_time
- Event 1 missing required field: venue_name
- Venue 1 missing required field: address
- Venue 1 missing required field: latitude
- Venue 1 missing required field: longitude
Please fix the JSON format issues above first.

TRAVEL TIME ISSUES:
- Travel times verification error: 'start_time'
Please allow more time between events or choose venues closer together.

ACTIVITY DURATION ISSUES:
- Activity durations verification error: 'start_time'
Please adjust event durations to be more realistic.

BUFFER TIME ISSUES:
- Buffer times verification error: 'start_time'
Please ensure events don't overlap and have sufficient buffer times.

OVERALL TIMING ISSUES:
- Overall timing verification error: 'start_time'
Please adjust the overall timing of the itinerary.

GENERAL GUIDANCE:
- Ensure all events have valid ISO format dates and times (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)
- Broadway shows typically start at 7:00 PM or 8:00 PM and last about 2-3 hours
- Restaurants in the Theater District typically open from 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM
- Allow at least 30 minutes for travel between venues in Manhattan
- Include pre-show dining with at least 1.5 hours before showtime
